languages.text: Пользуясь привилегиями Меркатум Табула Официале, Джай Хейдари проложила себе дорогу в сердце теневого мира Простора. Ее нарекли Баронессой Теней Коронуса, ибо в руках ее скопилось столько денег и власти, что именно она контролировала экономическую судьбу сектора. Даже сильнейшие фигуры были вынуждены считаться с ней. Считаться и ненавидеть. Долгое время Джай избегала покушений, пока однажды не исчезла. Впрочем, многие продолжали верить, что она правит Простором из теней еще более глубоких, чем прежде.

Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.
languages.original_text: Пользуясь привилегиями Меркатум Табула Официале, Джай Хейдари проложила себе дорогу в сердце теневого мира Простора. Ее нарекли Баронессой Теней Коронуса, ибо в руках ее скопилось столько денег и власти, что именно она контролировала экономическую судьбу сектора. Даже сильнейшие фигуры были вынуждены считаться с ней. Считаться и ненавидеть. Долгое время Джай избегала покушений, пока однажды не исчезла. Впрочем, многие продолжали верить, что она правит Простором из теней еще более глубоких, чем прежде.

traits.locale_text: Enjoying the privileges of Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the shadows of the Expanse. She became known as a Baroness of Shadows in Koronus, as she gathered so much wealth and power in her hands, that it was she who controlled the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures had to reckon with her. To reckon, and to hate her. For a long time, Jae avoided the assassination attempts, until one day she disappeared. Still, many continued to believe that she rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

Enjoying the privileges of Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the shadows of the Expanse. She became known as a Baroness of Shadows in Koronus, as she gathered so much wealth and power in her hands, that it was she who controlled the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures had to reckon with her. To reckon, and to hate her. For a long time, Jae avoided the assassination attempts, until one day she disappeared. Still, many continued to believe that she rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows in Koronus — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures had to reckon with her. That is, reckon with and despise her... For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. Still, many have continued to believe that she rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

She became known as the Baroness of Shadows in Koronus — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures had to reckon with her. That is, reckon with and despise her... For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. Still, many have continued to believe that she rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利享受着帝国官方行商执照的特权，设法跻进了科罗努斯扩区地下社会的核心圈子。她被称为阴影女爵，积累了巨大的财富和影响力。在那之后，她开始尝试操控扩区的经济命脉，即使是整个科罗努斯扩区最有权势的人，也不得不考虑她的影响……或者说，是一边考虑她的影响，一边鄙夷她的手段。在接下来的很长一段时间里，婕伊都能顺利挫败那些打算杀害她的敌人，直到某一天，她神秘失踪了。尽管如此，许多人仍然坚信，在那比以往更为幽深的阴影之中，她仍然统治着科罗努斯扩区。
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利享受着帝国官方行商执照的特权，设法跻进了科罗努斯扩区地下社会的核心圈子。她被称为科罗努斯的阴影女爵，积累了巨大的财富和影响力。在那之后，她开始尝试操控扩区的经济命脉，即使是最有权势的人也不得不考虑她的影响，或者说，是一边考虑她的影响，一边鄙夷她的手段……在接下来的很长一段时间里，婕伊都能顺利挫败那些打算杀害她的敌人。但后来的某一天，她消失了。尽管如此，许多人仍然相信，在那比以往更为深厚的阴影中，她仍然统治着科罗努斯扩区。

languages.text: Dank der Privilegien der Mercatum Tabula Officiale arbeitete sich Jae Heydari in das Herz der Unterwelt in der Ausdehnung vor. Sie wurde als Baronesse der Schatten bekannt und gewann so viel Reichtum und Einfluss, dass sie schließlich das wirtschaftliche Schicksal des ganzen Sektors kontrollierte. Selbst die mächtigsten und einflussreichesten Personen der Ausdehnung mussten sich vor ihr in Acht nehmen ... und sie verachten. Lange Zeit gelang es Jae, alle Anschläge auf ihre Leben zu vereiteln, doch eines Tages verschwand sie spurlos. Viele glauben jedoch, dass sie die Ausdehnung weiterhin beherrscht, nur aus noch tieferen Schatten als zuvor.
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: Dank der Privilegien der Mercatum Tabula Officiale arbeitete sich Jae Heydari in das Herz der Unterwelt in der Ausdehnung vor. Sie wurde in Koronus als Baronesse der Schatten bekannt und gewann so viel Reichtum und Einfluss, dass sie schließlich das wirtschaftliche Schicksal des ganzen Sektors kontrollierte. Selbst die Allermächtigsten mussten sich vor ihr in Acht nehmen. Und sie verabscheuen ... Lange Zeit gelang es Jae, alle Anschläge auf ihre Leben zu vereiteln, doch eines Tages verschwand sie spurlos. Viele glauben jedoch, dass sie die Ausdehnung weiterhin beherrscht, nur aus noch tieferen Schatten als zuvor.

languages.text: Profitant des privilèges conférés par la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari parvint à se faire une place de choix dans la pègre des Étendues. On la surnommait la baronne des ombres, car elle avait amassé une telle fortune et acquis une telle influence qu'elle en vint à contrôler l'économie de tout le secteur. Même les individus les plus influents des Étendues étaient forcés de composer avec elle, tout en la méprisant secrètement, tout en la méprisant secrètement. Elle déjoua longtemps les tentatives d'assassinat jusqu'au jour où elle disparut. Nombreux sont ceux qui pensent qu'elle règne toujours sur les Étendues depuis des ombres plus profondes encore.
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: Profitant des privilèges conférés par la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari parvint à se faire une place de choix dans la pègre des Étendues On la surnommait la baronne des ombres de Koronus, car elle avait amassé une telle fortune et acquis une telle influence qu'elle en vint à contrôler l'économie de tout le secteur. Même les individus les plus influents étaient forcés de composer avec elle, tout en la méprisant secrètement. Elle déjoua longtemps les tentatives d'assassinat jusqu'au jour où elle disparut. Nombreux sont ceux qui pensent qu'elle règne toujours sur les Étendues depuis des ombres plus profondes encore.

languages.text: Gracias a los privilegios de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari encontró su camino al corazón del crimen de la Extensión. Era conocida como la Baronesa de las Sombras de Koronus: amasó tanta riqueza e influencia como para controlar el destino económico del sector. Hasta las figuras más poderosas de la Extensión tenían que tratar con ella... por lo que la odiaban. Durante mucho tiempo, Jae consiguió rechazar los intentos de asesinato, hasta que un día desapareció. Aun así, muchos creen que sigue controlando la Extensión desde unas sombras aún más oscuras que antes.
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a los privilegios de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari encontró su camino al corazón del crimen de la Extensión. Era conocida como la Baronesa de las Sombras de Koronus: amasó tanta riqueza e influencia como para controlar el destino económico del sector. Hasta las figuras más poderosas tenían que tratar con ella... por lo que la odiaban. Durante mucho tiempo, Jae consiguió rechazar los intentos de asesinato, hasta que un día desapareció. Aun así, muchos creen que ahora controla la Extensión desde unas sombras aún más oscuras que antes.

languages.text: メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの特権にあずかるジェイ・ヘイダリは、エクスパンスの裏世界の中核へと船を進めた。彼女は「影の男爵夫人」として知られ、莫大な富と影響力を集めながら地域経済の命運を握る存在となった。エクスパンス内で大きな権力を持つ者であっても、彼女を侮ることはできなくなった。たとえ心中では見下げ果てていたとしても…長い間、ジェイは命を狙う輩を遠ざけることができていたが、ある日を境に姿を消した。それでも、さらなる影の深奥から彼女がエクスパンスを支配していると信じ続ける者は多かったという。
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの特権にあずかるジェイ・ヘイダリは、エクスパンスの裏世界の中核へと船を進めた。彼女は「影の男爵夫人」として知られ、莫大な富と影響力を集めながら地域経済の命運を握る存在となった。エクスパンス内で大きな権力を持つ者であっても、彼女を侮ることはできなくなった。たとえ心中では見下げ果てていたとしても…長い間、ジェイは命を狙う輩を遠ざけることができていたが、ある日を境に姿を消した。それでも、さらなる影の深奥から彼女がエクスパンスを支配していると信じ続ける者は多かったという。

languages.text: Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin sağladığı ayrıcalıkların keyfini süren Jae Heydari, Enginlik'teki yeraltı dünyasının merkezine adım attı. Elde ettiği büyük miktarda zenginlik ve nüfuz ile sektörün ekonomik gidişatını kontrolü altına aldı ve Gölgelerin Baronesi olarak bilinmeye başlandı. Enginlik'teki en güçlü kimseler bile onu dinlemek zorunda kalıyor, ondan nefret ediyorlardı. Jae, uzunca bir süre yaşamına kastedenleri atlatmayı başarsa da günün birinde ortadan kayboldu. Birçokları, gölgelerin daha da derinlerine çekilip oradan Enginlik'i yönetmeye devam ettiğine inanmayı sürdürdü.
languages.original_text: Enjoying the privileges of the Mercatum Tabula Officiale, Jae Heydari found her way into the heart of the Expanse's underworld. She became known as the Baroness of Shadows — having amassed so much wealth and influence, she came to control the economic fate of the sector. Even the most powerful figures in the Expanse were forced to reckon with her... reckon with and despise her. For a long time, Jae was able to thwart the attempts on her life, until one day she disappeared. But many continued to believe that she still rules the Expanse from shadows even deeper than before.

traits.locale_text: Mercatum Tabula Officiale'nin keyfini süren Jae Heydari, Enginlik'in kalbinin yeraltına girdi. Elde ettiği büyük miktarda zenginlik ve nüfuz ile sektörün ekonomik gidişatını kontrolü altına aldı ve Gölgelerdeki Barones olarak bilinmeye başlandı. Enginlik'teki en güçlü kimseler bile onu hesaba katmak zorunda kaldılar ve ondan nefret ettiler. Jae uzunca bir süre yaşamına kastedenleri atlatmayı başardı, ta ki bir gün ortadan kaybolana dek. Birçokları gölgelerin daha da derinlerine çekildiğine ve Enginlik'i yönetmeye devam ettiğine inanmayı sürdürdü.
